outcome: BCI failures worsen as Council gridlocks; Innovators and Directorate factions jockey for control, leading to public unrest.

events.description: No leader is named; unexplained BCI scoring anomalies cause widespread denial of basic services to hundreds of citizens.
A chaotic rush on community resource centers erupts after food and medicine access is halted for low-score residents.
A Directorate memorandum proposes emergency curfews, but Innovators counter with plans for a rapid system overhaul.
Students rally in central plazas, protesting BCI failures and demanding restoration of rights, while drones observe from above.
